definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
Guo Jingjing (1981-), Chinese female diver and Olympic gold medalist
Guo Jingjing (1981-), Chinese female diver and Olympic gold medalist

sentences.english: The nanocrystalline TiO2 film is sensitized by dyestuff with dip and absorption.
sentences.chinese: 采用浸渍吸附法对纳米晶二氧化钛薄膜进行染料敏化。

sentences.english: Nano-crystallization of metallic glasses is an effective way to prepare nanocrystalline materials.
sentences.chinese: 而非晶合金晶化法是纳米晶材料的主要制备方法之一。

sentences.english: This process eventually leads to nano-crystalline diamond structures.
sentences.chinese: 最后，这种方法会形成纳米晶金刚石结构。

sentences.english: In addition, the tribological properties of nanocrystalline Pb powders were tested with a four-ball machine.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在四球试验机上考察了铅纳米晶的摩擦学性能。

sentences.english: The morphology of diopside is dendritic and the plagioclase is spherulitic.
sentences.chinese: 透辉石为枝晶，斜长石为球粒晶。

sentences.english: The effect of atomic size factors and electron factors on the formation of quasicrystalline was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了原子尺寸因数和电子因素对准晶形成的影响。

sentences.english: Rutilated, lucky crystal, can bring good luck and improve interpersonal relationships.
sentences.chinese: 金发晶，开运水晶，可以带来好运，改善人际关系。

sentences.english: The application of sub-aperture stitching in long optical flat was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究子孔径拼接在长平晶测试中的应用。

sentences.english: Eutectic carbide in cast high speed steel M2 presents a network distribution.
sentences.chinese: M2铸造高速钢中共晶碳化物呈网状分布。

sentences.english: The invention provides an ultra-fine grain metal membrane or an ultra-fine grain alloy membrane and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明提供一种超细晶金属或合金薄膜及其制备方法。

sentences.english: Farady angle formulas of crystalline phase and noncrystalline phase interfaces are derived.
sentences.chinese: 导出晶相与非晶相界面法拉第角计算公式。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, too great interface thickness would coarsen the secondary arms.
sentences.chinese: 同时，过大的界面厚度会导致主枝晶和二次枝晶粗化。

sentences.english: The researchers injected the lectins into eighteen day old embryos .
sentences.chinese: 研究员将这个血凝素注射到有十八天的晶胚里。

sentences.english: Differential thermal analysis did not reveal the ammonium perchlorate phase change from rhombic to cubic .
sentences.chinese: 差热分析没有测出过氯酸铵从正交晶向立方晶的相变。

sentences.english: We rejoice in the sacrament that makes Hongzhou Huang and Xiaojing Zhang one.
sentences.chinese: 我们在这个使黄鸿洲与张皛晶合而为一的圣典中欢欣。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the research trend of electrodeposited nanocrystalline nickel is predicted.
sentences.chinese: 展望了电沉积纳米晶镍的研究趋势。

definition: Lingshi county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
stars of the Big Dipper that constitute the tail of the dipper
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
